data.comment: The match has started.
Maximiliano Salas of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 1, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 2, Necaxa's Unai Bilbao attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ricardo Chavez for Necaxa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 4, Ricardo Chavez returns to the field for Necaxa after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Necaxa.
Guadalajara drive upfield and Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, Necaxa's Alex Zendejas goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Aguascalientes.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Victoria.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
In the minute 16, Alexis Vega for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Guadalajara push forward at Estadio Victoria and Jose Macias gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Necaxa defence.
In the minute 18, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Guadalajara close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Necaxa.
Guadalajara's Jose Macias misses with an attempt on goal.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Necaxa have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Alexis Vega gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 34, Guadalajara are pushing forward but Jesus Angulo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, In Aguascalientes Necaxa attack through Juan Delgado. The finish is off target, however.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, The match at Estadio Victoria has been interrupted briefly for a check on Cristian Calderon, who is down injured.
He's off! Juan Delgado is shown a red card.
Cristian Calderon is back on the pitch.
In the minute 41, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Guadalajara, close to Necaxa's area.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jesus Molina.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara’s Jesus Molina is on his feet again at Estadio Victoria.
Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 46, Free kick Guadalajara.
Guadalajara make their first substitution with Uriel Antuna replacing Jesus Angulo.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Maximiliano Salas of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 51, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa are coming forward and Ian Gonzalez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 53, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Guadalajara drives forward and Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Necaxa surge into the attack at Estadio Victoria but Fernando Arce’s header is off-target.
In the minute 57, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 59, Cristian Calderon (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Idekel Dominguez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 62, Jose Macias (Guadalajara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 63, Martin Barragan is on a sub for Maximiliano Salas for Necaxa.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Necaxa throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
In the minute 64, Victor Vucetich is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Victoria with Miguel Ponce replacing Cristian Calderon.
Jose Vazquez is replacing Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara at Estadio Victoria.
Idekel Dominguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Necaxa.
In the minute 65, Ian Gonzalez puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
Uriel Antuna grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 67, Great play from Alexis Vega to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Jesus Molina with Oribe Peralta.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Guadalajara.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Aguascalientes Guadalajara drive forward through Miguel Ponce. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 71, Mario De Luna is replacing Idekel Dominguez for the home team.
In the minute 72, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Important block from the Necaxa defence as Jose Vazquez fires in a strike for Guadalajara.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Aguascalientes, Jose Macias of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Joao Rodriguez is on a sub for Ian Gonzalez for Necaxa.
In the minute 75, Necaxa make their fourth substitution with David Cabrera replacing Fernando Arce.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Guadalajara close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 79, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Ricardo Chavez for Necaxa drives towards goal at Estadio Victoria. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 81, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a fifth substitution, with Fernando Beltran replacing Dieter Villalpando.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Necaxa, close to Guadalajara's area.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Fernando Beltran gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Victoria. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 86, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Claudio Baeza is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Claudio Baeza has recovered and rejoins the match in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 87, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Necaxa throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Can Guadalajara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Guadalajara close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Alexis Vega.
